channel.title: Comments on: Ecto 2.0.0-rc is out!
channel.description: Plataformatec's place to talk about Ruby, Ruby on Rails, Elixir, and software engineering

item.title: By: ewh
item.dc:creator: ewh
item.description: Congrats on the release. We've been using Ecto 2.0 beta for a few weeks now and the new changes have been very welcome. Keep up the great work!
item.content:encoded: Congrats on the release. We’ve been using Ecto 2.0 beta for a few weeks now and the new changes have been very welcome. Keep up the great work!

item.title: By: Ricardo García Vega
item.dc:creator: Ricardo García Vega
item.description: Great news, this is getting better and better!
item.content:encoded: Great news, this is getting better and better!

item.title: By: David Antaramian
item.dc:creator: David Antaramian
item.description: Congratulations, and many thanks to you and the rest of the Ecto team and contributors!
item.content:encoded: Congratulations, and many thanks to you and the rest of the Ecto team and contributors!
